column5: My friends family has an opening day bass tournament in the Ganonoque area of the 1000 Islands.  They have been doing it since 1969.  I have been attending for the past 13 years.  Its a great fishery as many of you know.  Some pics: The Bass and Pike fishing was very good this year.  Most fish caught on Cotton Cordell Big O Crayfish and Perch.  Gold coloured spoons and spinner baits were also effective.  The largest 2 SM 5.75 on top, 5.5 on the bottom.  In the past 15 yrs of this tournament they have never caught a SM over 5 lbs.  Frying some fish  The Trophy Presentation
